ygData.subject: Re: where in Neriak is enchant silver
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Its in third gate on a vendor Near the Library. Never been there myself but thats what I hear. ... -- Silverlock,  ICQ 474725 Household Pests?  The SW-404
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:53 PM 5/17/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Scott" <s.fog@...>
>
>Im in Neriak now and cant seem to find the spell enchant silver. Need a name
>and place if possible, and can a nonenchanter buy the spell im in there with
>my other character who is a troll warrior.
>
>

Its in third gate on a vendor Near the Library. Never been there myself but
thats what I hear.
